FYI,

I modified the Mandrake package a few months ago -
rather a nightmare to package, I must say. Some
stability issues but that might be my flaky ATI
drivers.

My Linux box is sitting in storage this summer though,
so I don't have the .spec with me.

Anyone else tried running Falcon's Eye on Red Hat?

Regards,

Michel
